patthana10.10:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in MN 5.)
patthana10.10:0.3_0: And there are ten kinds of debate:
patthana10.10:1.1_0: No matter how to perform pleasant feeling ...
patthana10.10:1.1_1: No to cause a condition for the pleasant feeling ...
patthana10.10:1.1_2: Nor does each of these seven pleasant feeling ...
patthana10.10:3.1_0: There is no such thing as the essence of suffering, for the sake of pleasant feeling.
patthana10.10:4.1_0: for the sake of fifty coins that are not-self ...
patthana10.10:5.1_2: He has the seven results of deeds ...
patthana10.10:5.1_3: who have not reached four approaches.
